body:
Comment 15 by **guelfey**: 
My suggestion would be to make the explanation of append in the Slices article more
precise. For example:

"The append function returns a slice consisting of the elements x appended to s. If the
capacity of s is big enough to hold the resulting slice, it copies x to s[len(s):] and
returns s[:len(s)+len(x)]. Otherwise, a new sufficiently large slice is allocated and
filled."

If something along these lines is acceptable, I'd be happy to send a CL.
